sentence.Network_en: With one exce-ption his novels are shallow and lifeless things.

sentence.Network_en: There was no breathing or pulse and he was lifeless.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有呼吸，也没有脉搏，他已经死了。

sentence.Network_en: He managed to lighten the generally lifeless debate at times.
sentence.Network_cn: 他让这场总体很沉闷的辩论时不时迸出了些火花。

one morning day nurse arrived to bring water for their baths only to find the lifeless body of the man by the window , who had died peacefully in his sleep .一天早晨，护士打来水准备给他们洗澡，却发现窗边那位的身体僵硬了——他已经在睡梦中安详的死去。

entry.def: If a person or animal is lifeless, they are dead, or are so still that they appear to be dead.

example.ex: Their cold-blooded killers had then dragged their lifeless bodies upstairs to the bathroom...
example.tran: 那些冷血杀手那时已经将他们的尸体拖到楼上浴室里。

example.ex: There was no breathing or pulse and he was lifeless.
example.tran: 没有呼吸，也没有脉搏，他已经死了。

entry.def: If you describe an object or a machine as lifeless, you mean that they are not living things, even though they may resemble living things.

example.ex: It was made of plaster, hard and white and lifeless, bearing no resemblance to human flesh.
example.tran: 它由石膏制成，坚硬苍白，毫无生命，与人的肌体没有任何相似之处。

entry.def: A lifeless place or area does not have anything living or growing there at all.

example.ex: Dry stone walls may appear stark and lifeless, but they provide a valuable habitat for plants and animals.
example.tran: 干燥的石墙看起来也许荒凉且毫无生机，但它们为动植物提供了宝贵的栖息地。

entry.tran: 无生气的；沉闷的；单调的
entry.def: If you describe a person, or something such as an artistic performance or a town as lifeless, you mean they lack any lively or exciting qualities.

example.ex: With one exception his novels are shallow and lifeless things.
example.tran: 他的小说都是些肤浅沉闷的玩意儿，只有一本除外。

example.ex: ...a lifeless portrait of an elderly woman.
example.tran: 一位老妇人的毫无生气的画像

means.word_mean: 1. deprived of life; no longer living;
2. destitute or having been emptied of life or living beings;

sentences.sentence: "after the dance the littered and lifeless ballroom echoed hollowly"

means.word_mean: 3. lacking animation or excitement or activity;

sentences.sentence: "the party being dead we left early"
"it was a lifeless party until she arrived"

means.word_mean: 4. not having the capacity to support life;
